original_text: The wall was made from the jewel that is called jasper. The city was made from pure gold. The light shone through it, as light shines through clean glass.
korean_text: 그 성곽은 벽옥으로 쌓였고 그 성은 정금인데 맑은 유리 같더라

sentences.original_text: The wall was made from the jewel
The city was made from pure gold
as light shines through clean glass
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 빛이 깨끗한 유리를 통해 비추는 것처럼
